name: EnergyGridIQ (EIQ)
overview:
EnergyGridIQ (EIQ) is an online energy incentives and private deals platform. EIQ provides a dedicated building page for each building (whether commercial or home), which is constantly updated with energy related incentives, rebates and offers relevant and time sensitive for that location. EIQ is available across web and mobile and is unique in combining public and private deals.

With EIQ, the building or home owner can receive alerts when great new offers for energy retrofits, upgrades, new lighting, appliances, window replacements and other deals become available for their building. Agencies and companies can use analytics and customer engagement tools to engage with specific regions and small geographies and reduce their time and cost to market their programs and get better pre-qualification on the customers.

EIQ provides companies, agencies, manufacturers and other market partners and affiliates a unique and efficient global platform to launch new products, provide targeted promotions, bundle deals with other contemporary offers and get program and product feedback. As the grid gets smarter and options to optimize and become less grid dependent multiply, EIQ helps shepherd building and home owners and tenants through upgrades, demand response, renewable investments and other aspects of smart and continuous energy upgrades.
